snippet.title: Sokocat - Combo | Xbox Series S/X, Xbox One, PS5/4, Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Sokocat - Combo will be available on June 9!
More info:
https://bit.ly/Sokocat-Combo

Sokocat – Combo, brings two games from the series, Sokocat Islands and Sokocat Dungeon, a puzzle game that requires the player to push stone blocks to the correct position to reach the end of the level.

Sokocat Islands brings a tropical themed adventure; solve minimalist puzzles while listening to the sea and a relaxing soundtrack. Sokocat Dungeon, in the other hand, brings a mysterious adventure, Kitten Jone (the cat) now has to find artifacts in the dungeons of a castle. 

Enjoy the Islands, avoid the traps in the Dungeon and keep pushing the blocks to the right spot to succeed. Hope this cat has 9 lives.

Game Features

- Simple and intuitive gameplay;
- 100 levels to complete;
- Find treasures and unlock skills;
- Gameplay variations;

_________________________

About QUByte Interactive
QUByte Interactive is a Brazilian game developer and publisher focused on delivering high-quality experiences across the most diverse platforms, from mobile to PC to Video game consoles, with business partners in several countries such as USA, Canada, Germany, Japan and China. 

About Moraes Game Studio
Developer company created by just one person, Alysson Moraes, that made indie games like the series Space Elite Force, Space Smash, Space War Infinity and others minimalist relaxing games.
